TextView.android:text: Auto save feature is for safety for any sudden closing for that Notes app like phone shutdown, closing that Notes app from recent apps menu or otherwise. \nIf you was writing a new note or todo and you closed Notes app wrongly, your note or todo will be saved \nIf you was modifying an old note or todo and you closed Notes app wrongly, your old note or todo will remain as was and your entire modification will be saved in a new note or todo
